      • insertCustomTag

        public int insertCustomTag(String tagKey,
                           String tagValue,
                           boolean tagForce)
        Inserted tags with a given key from Chess games
        Parameters:
        tagKey - The key of the tag to be inserted
        tagValue - The value of the tag to be inserted
        tagForce - Whether to overwrite existing tags with key of tagKey
        Returns:
        The total number of games that were inserted
